long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Productivity with My Prompt Pal!

The ultimate Chrome extension designed to streamline your interactions with large language models like ChatGPT. 

Whether you‚Äôre crafting prompts for work, study, or personal projects, My Prompt Pal provides a seamless experience to create, store, and manage your prompts‚Äîall within your browser. Enhance your productivity and creativity with our user-friendly interface and powerful features.

Key Features

üìù Prompt Creation
- Create and edit prompts effortlessly with our intuitive text editor.
- Tagging System: Organize your prompts with tags (e.g., #chatgpt, #assistant) for easy categorization and quick access.

üíæ Prompt Storage

- Local Storage: Save your prompts locally within the browser, ensuring your data stays in your browser client
- Backup and Restore: Export your prompts to a JSON file and import them back when needed

üîç Prompt Management

- Search Functionality: Quickly find the prompts you need with a robust search bar.
- Insert into Conversation: Inject prompts directly into ChatGPT conversations with a click.
- Edit and Delete: Easily update or remove prompts as your needs change.
- Favorite Prompts: Mark your go-to prompts as favorites for faster access
